channel.title: python on Alexander Jackson
channel.description: Recent content in python on Alexander Jackson

item.title: CASTLEGUARD: Anonymised Data Streams with Guaranteed Differential Privacy
item.description: CASTLEGUARD is an extension of the CASTLE algorithm and provides the same guarantees as its predecessor with the addition of differential privacy. It was written as part of a team for CS347 Fault Tolerant Systems and published later that year.
